#summary HToolTip widget information

= Introduction =

A nice baloon tooltip window for GTK.

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/fr.daniil/SDayVaJcrpI/AAAAAAAAACo/0Ec8bJ6thso/h-gtk-baloon-tooltip.jpg]


= Details =

Use it like this:
{{{
using HollyLibrary;
...

   //optional line - you can set from here the tooltip appear interval( in nanosecs )
   HollyLibrary.HToolTip.ToolTipInterval = 10; 
   //assign tooltips to some buttons
   String text = "My first line of text \r\n";
   text       += "Second line of text bla bla \r\n";
   text       += "last line of text";
   //add the first simple tooltip ( with the default icon and colors )
   HToolTip.AddToolTip( button1, "title 1", text  );  
   //add the second tooltip with another stock-icon
   HToolTip.AddToolTip( button2, "title 2", text, "gtk-yes" );
   //add the third tooltip with customized colors
   HToolTip.AddToolTip( button3, "title 3", text, Color.White, Color.Black );
   //add the last tooltip with customized colors and another stock icon
   HToolTip.AddToolTip( button4, "title 4", text, Color.Yellow, Color.Orange, "gtk-no" );

}}}
